text: Uye namatai Allah uye musave munovasanganisa nevamwe vanamwari (mukunamata), uye mova munoita zvakanaka kuvabereki, vehukama, nherera, vanotambura, muvakidzani ane hukama, muvakidzani wekure (asina hukama), shamwari yepedyo, mupfuuri wenzira, uye neidzo (nhapwa) dziri mumaoko enyu erudyi (dzamunochengeta). Zvirokwazvo, Allah havadi vanodada nekuzvitutumadza
